thread.title: 88-11: Retired Marine Gen. John Kelly confirmed as DHS secretary
thread.title_full: 88-11: Retired Marine Gen. John Kelly confirmed as DHS secretary

author: Greg P.
title: 88-11: Retired Marine Gen. John Kelly confirmed as DHS secretary

persons.name: blumenthal booker cortez-masto gillibrand harris heinrich merkley udall van hollen wyden warren

organizations.name: sec of dept of homeland security

text:
88-11: Retired Marine Gen. John Kelly confirmed as DHS secretary Posted at 6:26 pm on January 20, 2017 by Greg P. 
Well, it wasn’t quite the 98-1 confirmation blowout of Gen. James Mattis as Secretary of Defense, but retired Gen. John Kelly still won confirmation 88-11 as the next head of the Department of Homeland Security: The Senate confirms John Kelly to become DHS secretary with an 88-11 vote 
— Ted Hesson (@tedhesson) January 20, 2017 
Here are the 11 no votes, all Dems: 11 nays on Kelly DHS nomination. All Dems. Blumenthal Booker Cortez-Masto Gillibrand Harris Heinrich Merkley Udall Van Hollen Wyden Warren 
— Chad Pergram (@ChadPergram) January 20, 2017 Here is the final roll call on confirmation for John Kelly as Sec of Dept of Homeland Security- 88-11. https://t.co/0H69ua15Ia pic.twitter.com/6XnZsESagI 
— Decision Desk HQ (@DecisionDeskHQ) January 20, 2017 
***
